segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to fall, and that stool is not stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should help him instead of just waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water overflowing all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just pouring water everywhere, and it's spreading fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one slips and falls because of all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and nice, it's a shame the kitchen is such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to turn off that faucet right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really risking it, standing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR
